DOC.brief_summary: As increase tidal volume , cross sectional area circumference Internal Jugular Vein ( IJV ) could increase . And In previous study , Trendelenburg position increase size IJV . So investigator would compare cross sectional area , circumference IJV peak airway pressure neutral Trendelenburg position
DOC.brief_title: Effects Increased Tidal Volume Internal Jugular Vein Cross-sectional Area
DOC.criteria: patient undergo general anesthesia history IJV cannulation uncontrolled cardiovascular disease severe pulmonary problem cervical spinal impairment
